name: ext_R4B_Contributor
title: Cross-version Extension for R4B.Contributor for use in FHIR R2
description: This cross-version extension represents Contributor from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Contributor|4.3.0 for use in FHIR R2.

element.definition: A contributor to the content of a knowledge asset, including authors, editors, reviewers, and endorsers.
unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references).

May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the element. Though any implementer is allowed to define an extension, there is a set of requirements that SHALL be met as part of the definition of the extension.
element.comment: There can be no stigma associated with the use of extensions by any application, project, or standard - regardless of the institution or jurisdiction that uses or defines the extensions.
